name: Market Match
description: Market Match doubles the value of CalFresh and WIC benefits at participating farmers markets, making fresh, locally grown fruits and vegetables more affordable for low-income families.
fullDescription: Market Match doubles the value of CalFresh and WIC benefits at participating farmers markets, making fresh, locally grown fruits and vegetables more affordable for low-income families.
whatTheyOffer:
- Double your CalFresh/EBT dollars (up to $10-15 match per visit)
- Bonus funds for fresh fruits and vegetables only
- Available at 250+ farmers markets statewide
- WIC participants also eligible at many markets
- Some markets offer senior bonus programs
howToGetIt: Bring your CalFresh EBT card to a participating farmers market. Visit the info booth, swipe your card, and receive matching tokens or scrip to spend on fresh produce. Check the website for participating markets.
keywords: Market Match, farmers market, CalFresh, EBT, WIC, double up, fresh produce, fruits vegetables, food stamps, local farm
